{{Multiple issues|{{more citations needed|date=April 2019}}{{notability|1=Films|date=April 2019}}}} {{Use Indian English|date=February 2019}} {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2019}} {{Infobox film | name = Swabhooni | image = File:Swabhoomi poster.jpg | caption = Official poster of the film | director = Ujjal Chatterjee | starring = {{ubl|[[Jackie Shroff]]|[[Debashree Roy]]|[[Tapas Paul]]|[[Satabdi Roy]]|[[Priyanshu Chatterjee]]|[[Tanusree Chakraborty]]|Debesh Roy Choudhury|[[Ashmit Patel]]|[[Barun Chanda]] }} | based on = ''Adhobha'' by [[Mahasweta Devi]]<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://eisamay.indiatimes.com/entertainment/cinema/debashri-roy-interview/articleshow/22281942.cms|title=কামদুনি ‘অধবা’, দেবশ্রী|last=|first=|date=2013-09-04|website=Eisamay|language=bn|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=4 November 2019}}</ref> | released = 2013 | music = [[Bappi Lahiri]] | producer = | runtime = 126 minutes | country = India | language = Bengali }} '''''Swabhoomi''''' (also spelled Swabhumi, translated as 'Own Land') is a 2013 [[Cinema of West Bengal|Bengali]] [[drama]] film co-produced and directed by Ujjal Chatterjee.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.cinestaan.com/movies/swabhoomi-36016|title=Swabhoomi (2013)|last=|first=|date=|website=Cinestaan|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=3 November 2019}}</ref> It is based on [[Mahasweta Devi]]'s novel ''Adhobha''.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.indiawest.com/entertainment/bollywood/jackie-shroff-to-act-in-bengali-film-swabhumi/article_2542a9bb-9ab3-549c-a49a-765cc40e8650.html|title=Jackie Shroff to Act in Bengali Film ‘Swabhumi’|last=PTI|website=India West|language=en|access-date=2019-04-22}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=http://archive.indianexpress.com/news/jackie-shroff-shoots-for-bengali-film/1081240/|title=Jackie Shroff shoots for Bengali film - Indian Express|website=archive.indianexpress.com|access-date=2019-04-22}}</ref> Set against the backdrop of [[Nandigram violence]], the film revolves around a woman whose husband goes missing after she joins a protest against land encroachment by government.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/bengali/movies/news/Jackie-Shroff-in-Nandigram-unrest-adaptation/articleshow/22544921.cms|title=Jackie Shroff in Nandigram unrest adaptation - Times of India|last=|first=|date=|website=The Times of India|language=en|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=4 November 2019}}</ref> It stars [[Tapas Paul]], [[Debashree Roy]], [[Satabdi Roy]], [[Priyanshu Chatterjee]], [[Pradip Mukherjee]], [[Barun Chanda]], Debesh Roy Chowdhury and [[Jackie Shroff]].
==Cast== *[[Jackie Shroff]] as Ishwar Singh *[[Debashree Roy]] as Saraswati<ref>{{Cite news|url=https://www.business-standard.com/article/pti-stories/swabhoomi-s-subject-still-crucial-mahasweta-devi-113070600429_1.html|title=Swabhoomi's subject still crucial: Mahasweta Devi|last=|first=|date=2013-07-06|work=Business Standard India|access-date=3 November 2019}}</ref> *[[Tapas Paul]] *[[Satabdi Roy]] as Parna *[[Priyanshu Chatterjee]] as Ritobaan *[[Tanusree Chakraborty]] as Srishti *[[Samrat Mukerji]] *Sneha Chakravarty *Debesh Roy Choudhury *[[Ashmit Patel]] *[[Barun Chanda]] *[[Pradip Mukherjee]] *[[Manoj Mitra]] *[[George Baker (Indian actor)|George Baker]] *[[Dimpy Mahajan]] {{Small|(Cameo)}}<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/bengali/movies/news/Dimpys-item-number/articleshow/18658781.cms|title=Dimpy's item number - Times of India|website=The Times of India|language=en|access-date=2019-04-22}}</ref>
== Soundtrack == {{Tracklist | extra_column = Singer(s) | title1 = Chikni Shabab Nashili | extra1 = [[Bappi Lahiri]], [[Sunidhi Chauhan]], [[June Banerjee]] | length1 =
| title2 = E Ladai Bachar Ladai | extra2 = [[June Banerjee]] | length2 =
| title3 = E Bachar Ladai | extra3 = [[Shaan (singer)|Shaan]] | length3 =
| title4 = Eschenno Jakhon Jetei Hobe | extra4 = Bappi Lahiri, Shaan | length4 =
| title5 =Jaoa Asha Bhalobasha | extra5 = Satyaki
| title6 = Sammati Chalo Na Motei | extra6 = Moumita, Sayak Bandopadhyay
| title7= Shanti Shanti Shanti Gram | extra7= Bappi Lahiri, June Banerjee, Shaan
| title8 = Tori Amar | extra8 = Moumita }}
==Reception== The movie received negative reviews upon release. [[The Times of India]] gave the movie a rating of 1/5 stars. The critics criticized the performance and dubbing of Jackie Shroff and direction of Ujjan Chatterjee, while praising the performances of Barun Chanda and Debesh.<ref>{{Citation|title=Swabhoomi Movie Review {1/5}: Critic Review of Swabhoomi by Times of India|url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/bengali/movie-reviews/swabhoomi/movie-review/22584661.cms|access-date=2019-04-22}}</ref>
